text: George Ross Anderson Jr. (January 29, 1929 â€“ December 1, 2020) was an American lawyer and politician. He was a Judge of the United States District Court for the District of South Carolina from 1980 until his retirement in 2016. He was nominated by President Jimmy Carter to the court. He also was a member of the South Carolina House of Representatives from 1955 to 1956. Anderson was born in Anderson, South Carolina. He was a Democrat. Anderson died on December 1, 2020 at a South Carolina nursing home at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:American judges Category:Politicians from South Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: George Ross Anderson Jr.
